Coming from a failed fishing trip, Peter (Darwin Shaw) meets Jesus Christ (Diogo Morgado), who convinces him to follow him. Then Christ will bring together 12 apostles whose mission is to spread its ideals by the Earth. However much we preach love and compassion to others, its growing popularity arouses the ire of important people of Jerusalem, who do not want the status quo is changed. The betrayal of one of his apostles, Judas (Joe Wredden), makes Christ be captured and brought to trial.
